nodes.bodyText:
These two methods should not throw anything, reason: InvalidParametersException (and other Exceptions) can come from many different sources and the treatment for each can be different.
Specifically for this issue, if the decryption fail, it means the input from the front-end is bad, so it is appropriate to re-throw as InvalidHttpParameterException, which does happen to be the same data flow, but it's a coincidence rather than a rule.
